instructions: Locate a video in your news feed on your iPhone or iPad. Tap the video to expand it to full-screen mode. Tap the TV icon. Choose the device you want to stream the video to in this case, the Apple TV .

Turn on the Apple TV. Go to the Facebook app on your iPhone or iPad. Swipe up from the bottom of the screen to open the Control Center . Tap the Screen Mirroring button. Tap Apple TV from the screen that opens. Your Facebook screen displays on the TV . Scroll to a video in your news feed and tap on it to open it in its own screen. It will start playing automatically on the Apple TV. To expand the video to full-screen, tap the full-screen icon at the top of the screen on your iOS device. Tap the video one time on your iOS device as it plays to bring up the familiar video controls at the bottom of the screen along with other controls. You can pause and restart the video, rewind, and see how long the video lasts. When you are finished with the video, tap the X in the upper left corner of the iPhone or iPad screen to return to the Facebook news feed and scroll to additional videos.
